overview:
Robert Gelinas is the founder, President & CEO of JPE Inc. Consulting, a technology marketing services and consulting firm. He is also the Publisher and Editor-in-Chief of ArcheBooks Publishing (www.archebooks.com).

Mr. Gelinas has spent over 20 years in executive IT sales and marketing roles - serving as President & CEO of iCrypt, Inc.; VP of WW Sales and Operations for CyberGuard; Director of Sales at WholeSecurity, CyberSafe, and SAIC/Global Integrity; Business Unit Director for StorageTech (STK); and a variety of technical and sales roles for Motorola/Codex.

Mr. Gelinas is a published novelist, author, and frequent public speaker.

More information is available via his LinkedIn Profile: http://www.linkedin.com/in/robertgelinas
